directions: Blend chickpeas, olive oil, tahini, lemon juice, spirulina, garlic, salt, and chipotle chile powder together in a blender or food processor until smooth. If hummus appears thick, gradually blend in reserved chickpea liquid until desired consistency is reached.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can chickpeas, drained with liquid reserved
1 clove roasted garlic, or more to taste
title: Roasted Garlic Green Hummus
